ValidationRule.description: You must have all the employees prior to WC
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordTypeId = '012700000001jeX', ISBLANK( Final_EE_Data_File_Received__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Sent_to_WC_Underwriting__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to have a date in the Final EE Data File Received field prior to sending the deal to WC Underwriting
